channel.title: Momina Masood on The Bombay Literary Magazine
channel.description: Recent content in Momina Masood on The Bombay Literary Magazine

item.title: With Love, Vincent – by Momina Masood
item.description: (A reimagining of a day in the life of Vincent van Gogh) My dear Theo… The moon shines with a vengeance tonight, dear brother, but no I must not worry you. Yes, it sounds lovely, and I have always loved words. The sound they make. Like wind chimes, the rustle of wheat fields, the ripple of… ripples, words, the moon looks curiously on at me as if I knew her secrets, do you remember as boys you once tore off the kitchen linen, the screeching noise it made, no not that sound no anything but that oh what have I said?
